item.title: Tinygo and WebGL
item.description: I’ve been playing around with building video games in golang and I thought it’d be fun to showcase progress as a kind of devblog for the game I’m working on. It would also be cool to show small demos of different features as I add them to the game, and maybe even host a latest build for people to try out. Enter: “Compiling Go to Webassembly” Here is the final product we will be building here today.
